name: config/initializers/perron.rb
content:
Perron.configure do |config|
  config.site_name = "Perron"

  config.default_url_options = {host: "perron.railsdesigner.com", protocol: "https", trailing_slash: true}

  config.metadata.description = "Rails-based Static Site Generator"
  config.metadata.author = "Rails Designer"
  config.metadata.title_suffix = "Perron"
  config.metadata.title_separator = " | "
  config.metadata.image = asset_url("ogimage.jpg")

  config.sitemap.enabled = true
end

name: app/views/layouts/application.html.erb
content:

<html>

name: app/models/content/post.rb
content:
class Content::Post < Perron::Resource
  configure do |config|
    config.metadata.type = "article"
  end
end
